about_the_game:
“Sherlock Holmes - Memories, stories, and thoughts” is a digital book that shares a glimpse into the stories behind the Sherlock Holmes series of games. It is a small token of appreciation for the support that we received from our community during a troubling time.

Written by Frogwares, and available for all to read, this digital book is available as a free download.
